data.strFullDescription:
[p]Bonerooms is a PvPvE multiplayer game about surviving in an ever-changing maze. Use an array of items to sabotage, deceive, and explode your friends as you fight to be the last one standing![/p][p][b]Bonerooms is designed for 4+ players! For the best experience, gather some friends, put on headphones, and use the in-game VOIP![/b]
[/p][list][*][p] Online Play with up to 8 players [/p][/*][*][p]A maze that is constantly changing[/p][/*][*][p] 15+ Items to use to defend yourself or sabotage others[/p][/*][*][p]Per-round maze modifiers to keep you on your toes[/p][/*][*][p] Proximity VOIP
[/p][/*][/list][p]Bonerooms can be played in one of three Game Modes:[/p][list][*][p]Try to be the last one standing in Free for All[/p][/*][*][p]Outlast the other team in Red vs. Blue[/p][/*][*][p]Work together to survive as long as possible in Co-Op![/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p]
data.strSnippet: The Bonerooms is a goofy horror-themed multiplayer game about surviving in a living maze. What will be your downfall? The spooky inhabitants of the maze, or your fellow players?
